channel.title: Comments on: Archangel Gabriel will make you a topos

item.title: By: LF
item.dc:creator: LF
item.description: I’ve read completely crackpot bullshit in my life but here this is the summum. Nice job;
item.content:encoded: I’ve read completely crackpot bullshit in my life but here this is the summum. Nice job;

item.title: By: David Roberts
item.dc:creator: David Roberts
item.description: That is just too cool. Of course, that is what AC is trying to do himself, if I can make an educated guess: make the topos without angelic assistance.
item.content:encoded: That is just too cool. Of course, that is what AC is trying to do himself, if I can make an educated guess: make the topos without angelic assistance.
